title: Tottenham v Wolves: Premier League – live
summary: Wolves, currently at the bottom of the Premier League table, face a challenging match against a high-flying Tottenham team. Rob Smyth provides a minute-by-minute report on the game. Fans are eager to see if Wolves can regain their form against strong competition.

title: Strictly Come Dancing: week one – live
summary: Couples are stepping onto the dance floor for the first time, showcasing their skills in a dance competition. The excitement builds as viewers anticipate the performances, curious about who will shine and who may struggle. Tune in to follow the journey of each pair as they navigate the challenges of dancing.

title: Ryder Cup: USA 3½-8½ Europe – visitors extend lead after foursomes
summary: Live updates from day two at Bethpage Black, as Europe aims to solidify their lead. Follow our writers for hole-by-hole coverage of the event. Stay tuned for the latest developments in the competition.

title: Isak debacle shows Newcastle remain stuck outside elite despite Saudi windfall | Jonathan Wilson
summary: The decision to let a prolific forward join a Premier League rival has surprised many, highlighting concerns about the club's standing. This move has intensified feelings of the club's diminished status in the competitive landscape. Fans and analysts alike are questioning the club's strategy and future outlook.

title: Sunderland sink Nottingham Forest to leave Ange Postecoglou waiting for win
summary: Omar Alderete scored the only goal, leading Sunderland to a 1-0 victory over Nottingham Forest. This win temporarily placed Sunderland in third position in the league. Nottingham Forest, under manager Ange Postecoglou, continues to seek their first victory of the season.
